name: laplace
description: Conversation block used to tune the hyperparameters for feature selection's Laplace algorithm

parameters.name: percentage
parameters.question: Type a decimal value between 0 and 1 that represents how much a feature should be different from the others in order to be kept (the higher the number the less features will be kept)
parameters.help: !! We could show which features would be removed and which would be kept !!
